summary: New heavy armor for males and females
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to my new armor mod for males and females

please read the instructions

this is a new kind of HEAVY armor
its made from the hardest wood of the world
the name of the wood it´s Lignum Vitae or/and Pockwood.

This wood its very hard and heavy for a wood,it can not even float
but it´s mutch lighter as iron or steel.

I think this mod is very lore friendly

The status of the armor is a little bit better status than ebony
to forge the armor on the smithing forge you must go under the category miscellaneous

It is also not so easy to forge this armor 
because you first need to have the ebony smithing perk to forge
and the arcane to temper it 
and dont forget the right materials 
some of them are not so easy to get.

you need:
taproot
steel
leather
leatherstripes
firewood
dragonscales
and ebony (to temper)

the armor contents:
helmet
cuirass
gauntlets
boots


The armor also has the same magic power as the ebonymail cuirass
if you go on the crouch position you will see what happent:-)

If you wisch to have the shield in the same look
take a look at my other mod,it is the lite Version of this armor and it includes the shield
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28072/



this mod is free to use for everyone,you can do whatever you like with this
just cedit me as the creator of the original mod


It was a really hard work to make all the maps in HD and also the normal maps 
for the right lightning effects,but it was worth of it because the lightning of this mod its fantastic (IMO) 
so please endorse if you like my mod

and dont forget to  post your pictures

this is the only think you can do to say thank you
to people like me who create mod´s for all of you
author: ILIAS
